355  var Config = new RepoConfig(false);
356  var deleteExcludeList = new List<string> { InterfaceDLLName };
357  deleteExcludeList.AddRange(Config.StaticDirectoryPaths);
358  deleteExcludeList.AddRange(Config.DLLPaths);
359  Program.DeleteDirectory(resurrectee, true, deleteExcludeList);
360 
361 
362  Directory.CreateDirectory(resurrectee + "/.git/logs");
363 
364  foreach (var I in Config.StaticDirectoryPaths)
365  {
366  var the_path = Path.Combine(resurrectee, I);
367  if (!Directory.Exists(the_path))
368  CreateSymlink(Path.Combine(resurrectee, I), Path.Combine(StaticDirs, I));
369  }
370  foreach (var I in Config.DLLPaths)
371  {
372  var the_path = Path.Combine(resurrectee, I);
373  if (!File.Exists(the_path))
374  CreateSymlink(the_path, Path.Combine(StaticDirs, I));
375  }
376 
377  if (!File.Exists(Path.Combine(resurrectee, InterfaceDLLName)))
378  CreateSymlink(Path.Combine(resurrectee, InterfaceDLLName), InterfaceDLLName);
379 
380  deleteExcludeList.Add(".git");
381  Program.CopyDirectory(RepoPath, resurrectee, deleteExcludeList);
382  CurrentSha = GetHead(false, out string error);
383  //just the tip
384  const string GitLogsDir = "/.git/logs";
385  Program.CopyDirectory(RepoPath + GitLogsDir, resurrectee + GitLogsDir);
386  try
387  {
388  File.Copy(PRJobFile, resurrectee + Path.DirectorySeparatorChar + PRJobFile);
389  }
390  catch { }
391  }
392  finally
393  {
394  lock (RepoLock)
395  {
396  RepoBusy = false;
397  }
398  }
399 
400  var res = CreateBackup();
401  if (res != null)
402  lock (CompilerLock)
403  {
404  lastCompilerError = res;
405  compilerCurrentStatus = TGCompilerStatus.Initialized;
406  return;
407  }
408 
409  var dmeName = ProjectName() + ".dme";
410  var dmePath = resurrectee + "/" + dmeName;
411  if (!File.Exists(dmePath))
412  {
413  var errorMsg = String.Format("Could not find {0}!", dmeName);
414  SendMessage("DM: " + errorMsg, ChatMessageType.DeveloperInfo);
415  TGServerService.WriteError(errorMsg, TGServerService.EventID.DMCompileCrash);
416  lock (CompilerLock)
417  {
418  lastCompilerError = errorMsg;
419  compilerCurrentStatus = TGCompilerStatus.Initialized;
420  return;
421  }
422  }
423 
424  if (!PrecompileHook())
425  {
426  lastCompilerError = "The precompile hook failed";
427  compilerCurrentStatus = TGCompilerStatus.Initialized; //still fairly valid
428  TGServerService.WriteWarning("Precompile hook failed!", TGServerService.EventID.DMCompileError);
429  return;
430  }
431 
432  using (var DM = new Process()) //will kill the process if the thread is terminated
433  {
434  DM.StartInfo.FileName = ByondDirectory + "/bin/dm.exe";
435  DM.StartInfo.Arguments = String.Format("-clean {0}", dmePath);
436  DM.StartInfo.RedirectStandardOutput = true;
437  DM.StartInfo.UseShellExecute = false;
438  var OutputList = new StringBuilder();
439  DM.OutputDataReceived += new DataReceivedEventHandler(
440  delegate (object sender, DataReceivedEventArgs e)
441  {
442  OutputList.Append(Environment.NewLine);
443  OutputList.Append(e.Data);
444  }
445  );
446  try
447  {
448  lock (CompilerLock)
449  {
450  if (compilationCancellationRequestation)
451  return;
452  canCancelCompilation = true;
453  }
454 
455  DM.Start();
456  DM.BeginOutputReadLine();
457  while (!DM.HasExited)
458  DM.WaitForExit(100);
459  DM.CancelOutputRead();
460 
461  lock (CompilerLock)
462  {
463  canCancelCompilation = false;
464  compilationCancellationRequestation = false;
465  }
466  }
467  catch
468  {
469  if (!DM.HasExited)
470  {
471  DM.Kill();
472  DM.WaitForExit();
473  }
474  throw;
475  }
476  finally
477  {
478  lock (CompilerLock)
479  {
480  canCancelCompilation = false;
481  }
482  }
483 
484  if (DM.ExitCode == 0)
485  {
486  lock (watchdogLock)
487  {
488  try
489  {
490  //gotta go fast
491  var online = currentStatus == TGDreamDaemonStatus.Online;
492  if (online)
493  Proc.Suspend();
494  try
495  {
496  if (Directory.Exists(GameDirLive))
497  //these two lines should be atomic but this is the best we can do
498  Directory.Delete(GameDirLive);
499  CreateSymlink(GameDirLive, resurrectee);
500  }
501  finally
502  {
503  if (online && !Proc.HasExited)
504  Proc.Resume();
505  }
506  }
507  finally
508  {
509  if (currentStatus == TGDreamDaemonStatus.Online)
510  {
511  try
512  {
513  Proc.PriorityClass = ProcessPriorityClass.Normal;
514  }
515  catch { }
516  Process.GetCurrentProcess().PriorityClass = ProcessPriorityClass.Normal;
517  Thread.CurrentThread.Priority = ThreadPriority.Normal;
518  }
519  }
520  }
521  var staged = DaemonStatus() != TGDreamDaemonStatus.Offline;
522  if (!PostcompileHook())
523  {
524  lastCompilerError = "The postcompile hook failed";
525  compilerCurrentStatus = TGCompilerStatus.Initialized; //still fairly valid
526  TGServerService.WriteWarning("Postcompile hook failed!", TGServerService.EventID.DMCompileError);
527  return;
528  }
529  UpdateLiveSha(CurrentSha);
530  var msg = String.Format("Compile complete!{0}", !staged ? "" : " Server will update next round.");
531  SendMessage("DM: " + msg, ChatMessageType.DeveloperInfo);
532  TGServerService.WriteInfo(msg, TGServerService.EventID.DMCompileSuccess);
533  lock (CompilerLock)
534  {
535  if (staged)
536  UpdateStaged = true;
537  lastCompilerError = null;
538  compilerCurrentStatus = TGCompilerStatus.Initialized; //still fairly valid
539  }
540  }
541  else
542  {
543  SendMessage("DM: Compile failed!", ChatMessageType.DeveloperInfo); //Also happens for warnings
544  TGServerService.WriteWarning("Compile error: " + OutputList.ToString(), TGServerService.EventID.DMCompileError);
545  lock (CompilerLock)
546  {
547  lastCompilerError = "DM compile failure";
548  compilerCurrentStatus = TGCompilerStatus.Initialized;
549  }
550  }
551  }
552 
553  }
554  catch (ThreadAbortException)
555  {
556  return;
557  }
558  catch (Exception e)
559  {
560  SendMessage("DM: Compiler thread crashed!", ChatMessageType.DeveloperInfo);
561  TGServerService.WriteError("Compile manager errror: " + e.ToString(), TGServerService.EventID.DMCompileCrash);
562  lock (CompilerLock)
563  {
564  lastCompilerError = e.ToString();
565  compilerCurrentStatus = TGCompilerStatus.Initialized; //still fairly valid
566  }
567  }
568  finally
569  {
570  lock (CompilerLock)
571  {
572  canCancelCompilation = false;
573  if (compilationCancellationRequestation)
574  {
575  compilerCurrentStatus = TGCompilerStatus.Initialized;
576  compilationCancellationRequestation = false;
577  SendMessage("DM: Compile cancelled!", ChatMessageType.DeveloperInfo);
578  TGServerService.WriteInfo("Compilation cancelled", TGServerService.EventID.DMCompileCancel);
579  }
580  }
581  }
582  }

int  minor 
)

updates the used byond version to that of version major .minor . The change won't take place until DD reboots. Calls ITGDreamDaemon.RequestRestart if blocked by a running DD instance. Runs asyncronously, use CurrentStatus to check progress

minorMinor BYOND version. E.g. 1381

if the update started, if another operation was in progress or DreamDaemon is running
